changes: Implemented a global, persistent Dark/Light/Auto theme system.
Theme choice is now synchronized across the React app and all static tool pages.
Eliminated 'Flash of Unstyled Content' (FOUC) on page load.
Upgraded theme toggle to a dropdown for explicit theme selection (Light/Dark/Auto).
Implemented User Accounts with Firebase for syncing favorites.
Upgraded Feedback Modal with structured categories.
Added a dynamic Announcement Banner managed from the admin panel.
Fixed a bug in the Admin Panel's suggestion status handler.
Core features: Tool directory, search, favorites, and dark mode.
